Direct Known Subclasses:
AeWSBPELFaultHandler
public class AeFaultHandler
extends AeDefaultFaultHandler
implements IAeCatch

Models the catch and catchAll providing a place to store the child activity for the fault.

isEnableCoordinatedActivityCompensation

protected boolean isEnableCoordinatedActivityCompensation()
Returns true since the coordinated activities (invokes) should also be compensated after executing the normal list of CompInfo objects.

Overrides:
